main event: A UFO observation report was filed regarding a strange light in the sky observed by C. L. Crites in Circleville, Ohio, on February 8, 1967.
interesting points: The light was described as very bright, similar to a welding arc., The observation took place around 8:30 PM., The object was reported to be hovering and maneuvering at a high altitude., The report was sent to the Ohio Bell Telephone Company for further information., The document indicates that the information provided may not be sufficient for a scientific evaluation.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: C. L. Crites reported the sighting to the Circleville Radar Site.
